resources.string: Click to add a due date

Tapping the add button will let you add a \'quick\' todo task to the list. Long pressing the add button will bring you to the add details page. Here you can add a due date and notes to your task. You can always update the title and due date, as well as add notes by clicking on any of the todo items
WELCOME!\nNote: There are two ways to add a task!
